select * from mh_order_history where cus_id=#{cus_id}
select * from mh_order_history where store_id=#{store_id}
select * from mh_order_history where order_no=#{order_no}
select distinct order_no, order_date, cus_id, store_name, order_status from mh_order_history, mh_store_member where order_no=#{order_no} and mh_order_history.store_id = mh_store_member.store_id
select order_qnt, menu_name, menu_price from mh_order_history, mh_menu where order_no=#{order_no} and mh_order_history.menu_id=mh_menu.menu_id
select max(order_no) from mh_order_history
select count(*) from mh_order_history where store_id=#{store_id} and to_char(order_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')=#{order_date} and order_status in (1, 2, 4)

select m.menu_name, oh.order_qnt from mh_menu m, mh_order_history oh where to_char(order_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')=#{order_date} and order_status in (1, 2, 4) and order_no=#{order_no} and oh.menu_id=m.menu_id

select distinct oh.order_no, oh.order_date, oh.order_status, cm.cus_id, cm.cus_address, cm.cus_address2, cm.cus_tel, cm.cus_email from mh_order_history oh, mh_customer_member cm where store_id=#{store_id} and to_char(order_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')=#{order_date} and order_status in (1, 2, 4) and oh.cus_id = cm.cus_id order by order_date asc
mapper.update: update mh_order_history set order_status=3 where store_id=#{store_id} and order_no=#{order_no}
update mh_order_history set order_status=2 where store_id=#{store_id} and order_no=#{order_no}
mapper.select: select distinct oh.order_no, oh.order_date, m.menu_name from mh_order_history oh, mh_menu m where oh.rowid in (select max(rowid) from mh_order_history where cus_id=#{cus_id} group by order_no)and oh.menu_id=m.menu_id order by oh.order_no desc
select count(*) from mh_order_history where cus_id=#{cus_id}
select count(*) from mh_order_history where order_no=#{order_no}
select m.menu_name, oh.order_qnt, m.menu_price from mh_order_history oh, mh_menu m where order_no=#{order_no}and oh.menu_id=m.menu_id
select distinct order_no, order_status from mh_order_history where cus_id=#{cus_id} and to_char(order_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd')=to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and order_status in (2, 3)

select * from mh_order_history where to_char(order_date,'yyyy') = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy')
select * from mh_car where order_no=#{order_no} order by car_date desc

select m.menu_name,m.menu_category,sum(menu_price*h.order_qnt) as menu_price,sum(h.order_qnt) as menu_num from mh_menu m, mh_order_history h where h.menu_id=m.menu_id and store_id=#{store_id} and to_char(order_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')=#{search_month} group by h.menu_id,m.menu_name,m.menu_category

select m.menu_name,m.menu_category,sum(menu_price*h.order_qnt) as menu_price,sum(h.order_qnt) as menu_num from mh_menu m left outer join mh_order_history h on h.menu_id=m.menu_id and store_id=#{store_id} and to_char(order_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')=#{search_month} where menu_category=To_number(#{menu_category}) group by h.menu_id,m.menu_name,m.menu_category

select m.menu_name,m.menu_category,sum(menu_price*h.order_qnt) as menu_price,sum(h.order_qnt) as menu_num from mh_menu m, mh_order_history h where h.menu_id=m.menu_id and store_id=#{store_id} and to_char(order_date,'yyyy-mm')=#{search_month} group by h.menu_id,m.menu_name,m.menu_category
